text.autoconfig.segmented.title: Segmented Options
text.autoconfig.segmented.option.enabled: Enables or disables the segmented hotbar
text.autoconfig.segmented.option.onlysel: Use vanilla hotbar rendering with segmented selection
If true, disables the segmentation of the hotbar but keeps the selection mechanics and rendering
text.autoconfig.segmented.option.scrollr: Enables or disables the mechanic where scrolling clears the segment selection
text.autoconfig.segmented.option.userese: Enables or disables the mechanic where using an item clears the segment selection
text.autoconfig.segmented.option.timerre: Sets the time in seconds after which the segment selection gets cleared, 0 disables this feature
